arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday vs Middlesbrough predictions: Boro to maintain promotion charge at Hillsborough
arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday look destined to be relegated to League One this season and Tom Hill expects Middlesbrough to pick up a routine win at Hillsborough on Wednesday night.
